Comments_List: I developed a general knowledge of the various fields of psychology, some of the history, important people and medical cases in the field, how the brain works, mental health disorders and how they are treated.
They need to do more breakout sessions and figure out a way to get students to participate more.
It would be better if the instructor and TA would have a more detailed outline of what to talk about in class that way we could gather whats really important from the lectures

The online lectures were excellent and the Professor was very interesting and engaging considering how much information he needed to communicate in a short amount of time. The homework assignments were challenging but made us think about the material.

I found the weekly meetings difficult because I did not have a lot of questions or much to say.
Great foundational Social Science course. I recommend it.

This is the only Yale course I have ever taken - see answers to 7 & 8

Definitely.
